session_info.name: MOXBP - Plenary Invited Oral Presentation, Medical Accelerators and Applications

papers.title: Demands and Perspectives of Hadron Therapy
authors: University of Pennsylvania School of Medicine
papers.abstract: This presentation should cover the clinical and biophysical aspects of hadron therapy and according technological perspectives. A comparison should be made of the benefits for hadrons in treating various tumor sites as compared with x-rays. Benefits as defined by survival rate and side effects will be given.
